sourcesContent:
import '../css/styleForCalculator';
import styleForCalculator from '../css/styleForCalculator';
import {
    View,
    Text,
    Button
} from 'react-native';

// import Buttons from '../Buttons/Buttons';

const ButtonsNumeric = (props) => {

    const isOperator = (e) => {
        return isNaN(e) && (e != '.') && (e != "=")
    }

    return (
        <View style={styleForCalculator.contButtons}>
            <View style={styleForCalculator.contBtnNumeric}>
                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('1')} title="1" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('2')} title="2" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('3')} title="3" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('*')} title="*" />
                </View>
            </View>

            <View style={styleForCalculator.contBtnNumeric}>
                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('4')} title="4" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('5')} title="5" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('6')} title="6" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('+')} title="+" />
                </View>
            </View>

            <View style={styleForCalculator.contBtnNumeric}>
                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('7')} title="7" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('8')} title="8" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('9')} title="9" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('-')} title="-" />
                </View>
            </View>

            <View style={styleForCalculator.contBtnNumeric}>
                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('0')} title="0" />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('.')} title="." />
                </View>

                <View style={styleForCalculator.Buttons}>
                    <Button onPress={() => props.insertNumber('=')} title="=" />
                </View>
            </View>

        </View>
    )
}

export default ButtonsNumeric;
